#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long getSumOfDivisors(long n);

int main()
{
    long n,sum=0,sum1=0;
    int t; cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
    sum=getSumOfDivisors(n);
    sum1=getSumOfDivisors(sum);
    if(sum1 == n)
        cout<<"Yes, amicable with "<<sum<<endl;
    else
        cout<<"No"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
long getSumOfDivisors(long n)
{
    long sum =1;
    for(long i=2;i<=n/2;++i)
    {
        if(n % i == 0)
        {
            sum += i;
        }
    }
    return sum;
}
